column3: add one battle destiny._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Nevar Yalnal_D_Interrupt_Lost_6_____________00-Premiere_R2_If both players have a spy at the same site
column2: draw destiny. Opponent's spy is lost if destiny > 2. If spy is Undercover

column1: 1__Ommni Box_D_Interrupt_Used_5_____________00-Premiere_C2_Shuffle any player's Reserve Deck or Lost Pile or Used Pile._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

1__Overload_D_Interrupt_Lost_4_____________00-Premiere_C2_Target any weapon (except a Gaderffii Stick or any Ewok weapon). Draw destiny. Weapon lost if destiny < weapon's destiny number. If destiny = 0
column2: the character or starship carrying weapon is also lost._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Physical Choke_D_Interrupt_Lost_3_____________00-Premiere_R1_Cause one Rebel Trooper to be immediately lost. OR If a Dark Jedi is present at a battle you have just won
column2: use 1 Force to attempt to choke any opposing character present. Draw destiny. If destiny > target's ability
column3: target is lost._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Precise Attack_D_Interrupt_Lost_4_____________00-Premiere_C2_During a battle at any site
column2: target one character or vehicle by combining the destiny draws of two or more of your weapons at same site._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Scanning Crew_D_Interrupt_Used_3_____________00-Premiere_C2_Use 1 Force to glance at the cards in the opponent's hand for 10 seconds. column1: 1__Tallon Roll_D_Interrupt_Used_4_____________00-Premiere_C2_Target two starfighters ( Your TIE/LN and any Rebel starfighter) present at same system or sector. Each player draws destiny. Opponent totals destiny and starship's power. You total destiny

column1: 1__Attack Run_L_Epic Event__0_____________01-NewHope_R2_"Deploy on Death Star:Trench. During your move phase
column2: you may make an Attack Run as follows: {Enter Trench:} Move up to 3 of your starfighters into trench (for free). Turbolaser Batteries and TIEs with weapons may now target your starfighters (wingmen first
column3: then lead if no wingmen remaining). Hit starfighters are immediately lost. {It's Away!:} Draw two destiny. {Pull Up!:} All starfighters now move to Death Star system (for free). If (total destiny+X+Y-Z) > 15
column4: Death Star is ""blown away."" X=ability of lead pilot or 3 if Targeting Computer is present. Y=total sites at largest Rebel Base (Yavin 4 or Hoth). Z=highest ability of TIE pilots present. *Your proton torpedoes are immune to overload."_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Off The Edge_L_Interrupt_Lost_2_____________04-CloudCity_R_Target one of your characters at a Cloud City site. Draw destiny. If destiny > character's destiny number
column2: retrieve Force equal to the distance. If destiny < character's destiny number
column3: lose difference. If destiny = character's destiny number
column4: character is lost._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Old Pirates_L_Interrupt_Lost_5_____________04-CloudCity_R_If a battle was just initiated involving Han and any Lando
column2: the eventual loser of the battle may not lose cards from Life Force to satisfy battle damage while that player has any cards in hand. OR Cancel Double-Crossing

column3: you may lose Chewie from hand to satisfy all battle damage and attrition against you. column3: starfighter is immune to attrition for remainder of turn._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

Adds 1 to immunity to attrition of all your scouts present at same exterior site who have immunity._No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column3: Cloud city icon
column4: Jabba's Palace icon
column5: and Endor icon characters are immune to Bad Feeling Have I._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column2: if at an exterior Endor site
column3: may use 2 Force to deploy an Endor site from Reserve Deck
column4: reshuffle. _No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Aim High_L_Effect__3_____________07-Endor_R_Deploy on table. When you fire two weapons (except lightsabers) in a battle
column2: your total power is +5. Also
column3: whenever opponent retrieves X cards
column4: opponent must first use X Force or that retrieval is canceled. (Immune to Alter.)_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Battle Plan_L_Effect__5_____________07-Endor_U_Deploy on table. You may initiate battles for free. Also
column2: for either player to initiate a Force drain
column3: that player must first use 3 Force unless that player occupies a battleground site (except a holosite) and a battleground system. (Immune to Alter.)_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Commando Training_L_Effect__4_____________07-Endor_C_Deploy on your side of table. Each of your non-unique Rebels armed with a non-unique blaster is forfeit +2
column2: adds 1 to his total weapon destiny and
column3: where present
column4: cumulatively adds 1 to total battle destiny. (Immune to Alter while your non-unique blaster is on table.)_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column2: when Leia is battling with Han and Chewie and you are about to draw a card for battle or weapon destiny
column3: you may instead use Leia's ability number._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__I Hope She's All Right_L_Effect__3_____________07-Endor_U_Deploy on table. Your non-unique scouts are forfeit +1. During every draw phase
column2: unless opponent's character of destiny < 4 occupies a battleground site
column3: opponent loses 1 Force. Effect canceled unless your characters of destiny < 4 occupy two battleground sites._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column3: Count Me In or I'm With You Too into hand from Reserve Deck
column4: reshuffle. While Han is at an exterior battleground site
column5: he is immune to attrition < 4._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Insurrection_L_Effect__5_____________07-Endor_U_Deploy on table. Unique (*) Rebels of ability < 3 are forfeit +2. Nabrun Leids and Elis Helrot are limited to owner's move phase and exterior sites. Once during each of your deploy phases
column2: may deploy one docking bay from Reserve Deck
column3: reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__That's One_L_Effect__3_____________07-Endor_R_Deploy on Chewie. He is immune to attrition < 4 at exterior sites. Visored Vision is immune to Sense. While at same battleground site as Han
column2: Chewie adds 1 to each of his weapon destiny draws and Life Debt is a Used Interrupt during a battle there._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Wokling_L_Effect__2_____________07-Endor_R_Use 2 Force to deploy on an Endor site where you have an Ewok. Moves like a character. Adds one Light side icon while your Ewok is present. Effect lost if you initiate a battle here or opponent controls this location._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No
1__Deactivate The Shield Generator_L_Epic Event__0_____________07-Endor_R_"Deploy on Bunker. During your control phase
column2: if you control Bunker with a Rebel
column3: attempt to ""blow away"" Bunker as follows: {Charges! Come On
column4: Come On!}: Draw two destiny. Add 3 to total for each Explosive Charge on Bunker. {Move! Move! Move!}: If total destiny > 12
column5: your characters here may relocate to Back Door for free
column6: Bunker and Landing Platform (if on table) are ""blown away
column7: opponent loses 8 Force and this card is lost."_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Careful Planning_L_Interrupt_Start/Used_5_____________07-Endor_C_USED: If a battle was just initiated
column2: draw destiny and activate up to that much Force. STARTING: If you have not deployed an Objective
column3: deploy from Reserve Deck one battleground site (or two <> sites) related to your starting location. Place Interrupt in Reserve Deck._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Covert Landing_L_Interrupt_Lost/Used_4_____________07-Endor_U_USED: If your shuttle (including a shuttle vehicle) is in battle
column2: add one battle destiny. LOST: If your starfighter just landed at a site where opponent has no presence
column3: deploy scouts (and weapons on those scouts) aboard it (capacity permitting) from Reserve Deck
column4: reshuffle._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Endor Celebration_L_Interrupt_Used_5_____________07-Endor_R_Cancel Tatooine Occupation
column2: Cloud City Occupation or Rebel Base Occupation. (Immune to Sense.) OR During your activate phase
column3: activate 1 Force for each Endor battleground you occupy._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Ewok And Roll_L_Interrupt_Used_5_____________07-Endor_C_ If opponent's creature vehicle or AT-ST just deployed or moved to where your Ewok is present
column2: draw destiny. Creature vehicle lost if destiny > defense value. AT-ST crashed if destiny + 2 > armor. OR If your Ewok is defending a battle
column3: add 2 to your total power._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Ewok Log Jam_L_Interrupt_Used_4_____________07-Endor_C_If opponent's transport vehicle or AT-ST just deployed or moved to an Endor site
column2: draw destiny. Add 1 for each of your Ewoks present. Vehicle lost if destiny - 1 > defense value. OR Lose 1 Force to take into hand a card you just drew for battle or weapon destiny. _No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Ewok Rescue_L_Interrupt_Lost_4_____________07-Endor_C_If your Ewok is present with an escorted captive
column2: draw destiny. Add 2 if Ewok is a scout. If total destiny > escort's defense value
column3: captive is released. OR If your Ewok is defending a battle
column4: up to three of your Ewoks at one exterior site may move as a 'react' (for free)._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Firefight_L_Interrupt_Used_5_____________07-Endor_C_During a battle
column2: if you have weapons at both sites adjacent to that battle
column3: add 3 to your total power and add one battle destiny. OR For remainder of turn
column4: your scout at an exterior site is power +1 and adds 1 to each of that character's weapon destiny draws._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Fly Casual_L_Interrupt_Lost/Used_6_____________07-Endor_R_USED: Cancel Early Warning Network or It's An Older Code. OR During your deploy phase
column2: deploy one starship (deploy -1) and/or one pilot to a system even without presence or Force icons. LOST: Take one Tydirium or Tantive IV into hand from Reserve Deck
column3: reshuffle._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Free Ride_L_Interrupt_Used_5_____________07-Endor_U_If you control a location where opponent has a speeder bike
column2: AT-ST or skiff
column3: steal that vehicle (any characters aboard are lost). OR Peek at one card randomly selected from opponent's hand. If that card is a speeder bike
column4: AT-ST or skiff
column5: steal it into hand._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Get Alongside That One_L_Interrupt_Used_4_____________07-Endor_U_Target two non-creature vehicles with maneuver (one yours
column2: one opponent's) present at same site. Both players draw destiny
column3: add your vehicle's maneuver to your total. Lowest total loses vehicle. OR Your speeder bike piloted by Luke or a scout adds one battle destiny._No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_Yes_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No_No

column1: 1__Here We Go Again_L_Interrupt_Lost_3_____________07-Endor_R_If a battle that opponent initiated just ended
